doc:
Stuart Buchanan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stuart_Buchanan 0 Stuart Buchanan (March 18, 1894 – February 4, 1974) was an American voice actor and announcer, who was the casting director for the Walt Disney Company, best known for voicing The Huntsman in the 1937 Disney animated film Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs. He also made cameo voiceover roles as a flight attendant in Saludos Amigos (1942) and in Super-Speed (1935). He also voiced Goofy in The Mickey Mouse Theater of the Air in 1938. Stuart_Buchanan ( March_18_,_1894 – February_4_,_1974 ) was an_American_voice_actor_and_announcer , who was the_casting_director for the_Walt_Disney_Company , best_known for voicing The_Huntsman in the_1937_Disney_animated_film_Snow_White and the_Seven_Dwarfs . He also made cameo_voiceover_roles as a_flight_attendant in Saludos_Amigos_(_1942_) and in Super-Speed_(_1935_) . He also voiced Goofy in The_Mickey_Mouse_Theater of the_Air in 1938 .
